mapper.select: SELECT A.ticket_id AS ticketId , A.order_id AS orderId , A.expired_date AS expiredDate , A.ticket_status AS ticketStatus , A.use_date AS useDate , A.created_at AS createdAt , B.point FROM ticket A INNER JOIN user_payment_member B ON A.order_id = B.order_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
